allow: Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no hassio@homeassistant.local 'for f in /run/s6/container_environment/*; do export """"$(basename $f)""""=""""$(cat $f)""""; done; ha core logs 2>&1 | tail -300')
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no hassio@homeassistant.local 'for f in /run/s6/container_environment/*; do export """"$(basename $f)""""=""""$(cat $f)""""; done; ha core logs 2>&1 | tail -500')

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no hassio@homeassistant.local 'for f in /run/s6/container_environment/*; do export """"$(basename $f)""""=""""$(cat $f)""""; done; curl -s -H """"Authorization: Bearer $SUPERVISOR_TOKEN"""" -H """"Content-Type: application/json"""" http://supervisor/core/api/states')
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no hassio@homeassistant.local 'for f in /run/s6/container_environment/*; do export ""$(basename $f)""=""$(cat $f)""; done; ha core logs 2>&1 | tail -100')
